findings.title: Unchecked ERC-20 transfer() and transferFrom() call
findings.description: The return value of `transfer` and `transferFrom` function is not checked, which can lead to silent transfer failures and unexpected behavior in the contract.

findings.title: User reward should not be set after reward claiming is started
findings.description: The user reward should not be set after reward claiming is started because it can cause unexpected errors and affect the share/rewardToken ratio.

findings.title: setShares() lacks zero address validation
findings.description: _address can be zero and if that's the case, the shares will be assigned to a zero address and the winner'sNotClaimed will be inaccurately increased one.

findings.title: uint256 _shares is always non-negative
findings.description: The check in setShares() function require (_shares >= 0 , "Shares must be non-negative" ); is redundant as the uint256 _shares is unsigned integer and it is always >= 0
